moves.1. e4: My standard. (I used to experiment but got unfavorable results)
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 f6: An ugly little move that if often disastrous
moves.3... fxe5: ?? Taking the Knight is probably one of the worst moves here.
moves.4... g6: Probably the best although it allows a fork
moves.5. Qxe5+ Qe7 6. Qxh8 Nf6 7. d3: Preparing Bc1-h6 exploiting the pin on the black DSB
moves.10... Qe6: ?? This is a very bad move as it hangs a bishop and seriously displaced the Black king. Realizing this black resigned. I probably would have played on
